record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:38 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, May 10, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
